scripts.deploy: run-s build deploy.failIfGitIsDirty deploy.ensureBranch deploy.ensureWorktree deploy.copy deploy.commit deploy.push
scripts.deploy.failIfGitIsDirty: echo 'fail if we have uncommitted changes' ; git diff-index --quiet HEAD
scripts.deploy.ensureWorktree: git worktree add gh-pages/ gh-pages || true
scripts.deploy.commit: COMMIT_MSG=`git log -1 --pretty=%B` ; cd gh-pages ; git add -A ; git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" ; cd ..
